warning_banner_variants: Warning: This may expose professional mistakes. Proceed only if you have thick skin.
Don't click unless you can handle brutal honesty.
Brace yourself. Things are about to get real... and slightly embarrassing.

cta_variants.primary: Let's see what I did in 2025?

error_messages.user_not_found: User not found. Check the username and try again.
error_messages.rate_limit: GitHub rate limit exceeded. Wait a minute and try again.
error_messages.empty_year: Quiet year. Too stealthy. No shame to dish.

footer_quip: Â© 2025 GitShame. All roasts are fictional. Mostly.
share_captions: I survived GitShame 2025 and it was... complicated.
GitHub just told me the truth. I'm not okay.
My commits have been roasted. Send help.
tooltip_help: Enter a public GitHub username to see their year in review... roasted.
empty_state_message: Enter a GitHub username above to get started.
